option.name: active
option.desc: Select the active (open) panel by zero-based index. Negative values select backward from the last. When collapsible: true, active: false closes the accordion, otherwise setting active to false will have no effect.

option.name: animated
option.desc: Choose your favorite animation, or disable them (set to false). In addition to the default, 'bounceslide' and all defined easing methods are supported ('bounceslide' requires UI Effects Core).

option.name: collapsible
option.desc: Whether all the sections can be closed at once. Allows collapsing the active section by the triggering event (click is the default).

option.name: event
option.desc: The event on which to trigger the accordion. For hover, use 'mouseover'.

option.name: header
option.desc: Selector for the header element. Must be a selector that applies to the accordion container element, via .find(). The default covers both ui/li accordions, as well as flat structures like dl/dt/dd

desc.p: Controls the height of the accordion and each panel.

dl.dd: all panels will be set to the height of the tallest panel
expand to the available height based on the accordion's parent height
each panel will only be as tall as its content

option.name: icons
option.desc: Icons to use for headers. Icons may be specified for 'header' and 'headerSelected', and we recommend using the icons native to the jQuery UI CSS Framework manipulated by jQuery UI ThemeRoller

event.name: beforeActivate
event.desc: Triggered directly after a panel is activated. Can be cancelled to prevent the panel from activating.

argument.name: event
argument.desc: Type depends on event option. Commonly would be click or mouseover.

argument.name: ui
argument.desc: Extra event data for the ui accordion beforeActivate event

event.name: activate
event.desc: Triggered after the accordion panel has be activated (after animation completes).

argument.name: ui
argument.desc: Extra event data for the ui accordion activate event
